title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hostable LLM runner with a REST/CLI API, model library, and Docker images.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (also on npm).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama (PyPI package) with sync & async support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured web UI (Open-WebUI) for Ollama: chat, PDF, RAG, user auth, Docker image.

title: ollama-cli (mattw/ollama-cli)
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting, and prompts.

title: ollama-copilot (sammcj/ollama-copilot)
summary: GitHub-Copilot-like VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline completions.

title: ollama-rag (vanetix/ollama-rag)
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama (Maven Central) with fluent API.

title: ollama-node (cheshire-cat/ollama-node)
summary: Community Node.js wrapper for Ollama (npm: ollama-node) with TypeScript support.

title: ollama-discord (rizerphe/ollama-discord)
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that forwards messages to Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm (otwld/ollama-helm)
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-dagger (grouville/ollama-dagger)
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing.

title: ollama-camunda (multimap/ollama-camunda)
summary: Camunda 8 connector that invokes Ollama models inside BPMN workflows.

title: ollama-rust (mdrokz/ollama-rust)
summary: Rust crate (ollama-rs) providing async/sync bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-zig (akhildevelops/ollama-zig)
summary: Zig client library for Ollama with build.zig integration.

title: ollama-n8n (n8n-io/n8n-nodes-ollama)
summary: Official n8n community node to call Ollama models inside automation workflows.

title: ollama-vscode (ollama-vscode/ollama-vscode)
summary: VS-Code extension to chat with local Ollama models inside the editor sidebar.

title: ollama-r (mlverse/ollamar)
summary: R package (ollamar) wrapping the Ollama API for R users.

title: ollama-slack (defense-unicorns/ollama-slack)
summary: Slack bot that leverages Ollama for on-prem AI assistance inside Slack.
